mapper.insert: insert into myissue (piseq,pfilename,pfilesize,pititle,picontent,pistart, piend, ispibook, email, pidate, mygfilename, mymention, myurl) values (PISEQ_MYISSUE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfilesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pititle}, #{picontent}, #{pistart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{piend,jdbcType=DATE}, 0, #{email}, sysdate, #{mygfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mymention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT piseq, pititle, picontent, pidate, ispibook FROM myissue WHERE email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select piseq,pititle,pidate from myissue where email = #{email}
select t.tseq,t.tititle,t.tidate,t.tiseq,p.pname from tissue t join teampjt p on t.tseq = p.tseq where t.email = #{email}
